name: joplin-plugin-note-tabs
description: Allows to open several notes at once in tabs and pin them.
author: Benji300

scripts.dist: webpack --env joplin-plugin-config=buildMain && webpack --env joplin-plugin-config=buildExtraScripts && webpack --env joplin-plugin-config=createArchive
scripts.update: npm install -g generator-joplin && yo joplin --node-package-manager npm --update
